tool_description: PyUnity is a powerful email marketing API that allows you to reach your customers instantly, easily, and effectively. Our service is built on the latest-generation technologies and enabled by our experienced team of developers. The PyUnity API delivers massive scalability, reliable architecture, and adaptivity to your needs.
name: PyUnity - Email Marketing
title: PyUnity - Email Marketing

api_list.name: Send Emails
api_list.description: Send Emails Directly To Your Clients Using This Endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pyunity-email-marketing.p.rapidapi.com/send_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pyunity-email-marketing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pyunity-email-marketing.p.rapidapi.com/send_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pyunity-email-marketing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
